div.p: F. Colleoni and L. De Santis designed the study. L. De Santis, C.C. Sorlien, E. Olivo, C. Sauli, N. Wardell and S. Prato, discussed the paleo-bathymetries and paleo-topographies reconstructions used in the ice-sheet simulations. L. De Santis prepared Figure 5. F. Colleoni and A. Bergamasco designed the simulations. F. Colleoni, E. Montoli and A. Bergamasco analysed the results. F. Colleoni, E. Montoli and E. Gasson discussed the model outputs together and wrote the first Results section. F. Colleoni, L. De Santis, C.C. Sorlien, P.J. Bart and E. Olivo wrote the second Result section together. L. De Santis and C.C. Sorlien discussed and wrote the backstripping section of supplementary material. All authors reviewed the manuscript.
